ygData.subject: Re: Quests on Faydwer
ygData.msgSnippet: On the same note if you re a beginning necro and are into hunting firebeetles this box is a very usefull container to keep their eyes in untill you hit the
ygData.messageBody:
On the same note if you're a beginning necro and are into hunting firebeetles this box
is a very usefull container to keep their eyes in untill you hit the store :)

Juan Custer wrote:

> From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
>
> You are giving a wooden box with empty slots. What you do is put
> one eye in each slot. What you have then is your wooden box filled with
> eyes in every slot. Then at the bottom of the box inventory box, there's a
> button called COMBINE. Click it and if you have the right kind and quantity
> of beetle eyes, it will create a new item. This item will be called, "A box
> of fire beetle eyes" and cannot be opened. Then you head to your guild
> master and GIVE the box to him. Then you've completed the quest.
>
> However I must state that my "reward" was pretty lame. I think I
> got a few silver and a sliver of XP and a tad of faction increase. In other
> words, I gave away a gold piece for crap. I heard that the reward is very
> random though too... but essentially I think you are better off just selling
> them for money.
>
> Malark, Dark'Fier Ravens, Karana
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: James Lecouffe [mailto:puma@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 3:47 PM
> > To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> > Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Quests on Faydwer
> >
> >
> > From: "James Lecouffe" <puma@...>
> >
> > Does it have to be a woden box full of eyes, or do you mean
> > you fill the
> > give goxes? Also do you give it to your guld master on that
> > stage or is it
> > some where else? I never have been given a tast befor from him.
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Vadim Glik <zvadim@...>
> > To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> > Date: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 12:29 PM
> > Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Quests on Faydwer
> >
> >
> > >From: Vadim Glik <zvadim@...>
> > >
> > >Next quest in Neriak.
> > >
> > >The menial tasks quest in neriak os followed by other tasks
> > quest. You are
> > told about
> > >it once you return the full box of fire beetle eyes. This
> > quest includes
> > assembling
> > >more beetle eyes, but from beetles that are only found on
> > Kerra Island, you
> > only need 4
> > >of those. You're told that population of Kerra Isle is
> > protective of those
> > beetles,
> > >also you're requested to bring a tusk of some elephant
> > creature which roams
> > the plains
> > >of west of Qeynos.
> > >
> > >Also, there is a low-level (similar to menial tasks) quest
> > in Freeport.
> > Don't remember
> > >the details, but they are given once you hail the Necro
> > guild master NPC
> > underneath
> > >freeport. You really don't get much for it either.
> > >
> > >TkAdam@... wrote:
> > >
> > >> From: TkAdam@...
> > >>
> > >> I know of none in your lands.
> > >>
> > >> There are two quests in Neriak
> > >>
> > >> Fire beetle eyes... which is only worth favor and
> > experience, as the
> > money
> > >> given is less than the value of the 10 fire beetle eyes you have to
> > gather.
> > >>
> > >> Courier Duty... have not totally figured this one out yet,
> > it entails
> > travel
> > >> :)
> > >>
> > >> Sonoroud
